fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 30.45 points or 0.16% to settle at 19,465. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 1.08% to 12.13. Reliance Industries (RIL), Infosys and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
